name: Go Santa Go!
description:
A fun game made for the Jame Gam Christmas Edition.

As christmas is coming near, a bit of an aciddent happens at santa's factory. Santa has to go out and collect as much presents as he can. Luckily, he has his magical hat where the more gifts he collects the faster he goes. But if santa falls on his hat, then santa will no longer be able to continue. How many presenets can you collect?

A and D to tilt left and right, right arrow key to move right.

Collect as many gifts as you can before the timer runs out!

Gifts give a temporary speed boost and give 0.5 seconds of extra time.

Make sure you do not land on santa's hat or you lose!

Music: Little Spacecraft (c) by Dag0. Dag0 is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

Santa Sprite: Mister C! by Jobit91
